entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mildred Lake 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -23.3°C
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
